original_text: But Nadab and Abihu fell down and died in front of the Lord. That happened when they offered strange fire to the Lord in the Sinai desert. They had no children. So only Eleazar and Ithamar worked as priests while their father Aaron was alive.
korean_text: 나답과 아비후는 시내 광야에서 여호와 앞에 다른 불을 드리다가 여호와 앞에서 죽어 자식이 없었으며 엘르아살과 이다말이 그의 아버지 아론 앞에서 제사장의 직분을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: But Nadab and Abihu fell down
and died in front of the Lord
That happened when they offered strange fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그들이 이상한 불을 드릴 때 일어났습니다

sentences.original_text: to the Lord in the Sinai desert
So only Eleazar and Ithamar worked as priests
while their father Aaron was alive
